dialogue: I need you to join me on a sales call to tell my customer how easy it will be to switch to our software.
This is a sales call. All you need to do is say everything will be easy.
What happens when they find out it isn't easy?
They won't find out until after they pay us.
What will you do when they complain?
I'll tell your boss you misled them.
Not if I warn him first!
Too late. I already told him you're a liar.
